head.title: World Briefing | Europe: Spain: A Madrid Terror Defendant Is Freed

identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Manufacturing, Operations and Logistics

hedline.hl1: World Briefing | Europe: Spain: A Madrid Terror Defendant Is Freed

abstract.p: CNN reports that, Brahim Moussaten, one of 29 defendants in Madrid train bombings trial, is cleared of all charges and is free; prosecutors drop all charges against him for lack of evidence; he was accused of having helped two suspects escape after 2004 attacks (S)

block.p: One of the 29 defendants in the Madrid train bombings trial has been cleared of all charges and is a free man, CNN reported on its Web site, citing his lawyer and a court spokeswoman. It said prosecutors had dropped all charges against the Moroccan-born defendant, Brahim Moussaten, 23, for lack of evidence. He was accused of having helped two suspects escape after the 2004 attacks, one who is now a defendant in the trial and another who is believed to have died in Iraq as a suicide bomber. Mr. Moussaten's brother and an uncle remain on trial.

It said prosecutors had dropped all charges against the Moroccan-born defendant, Brahim Moussaten, 23, for lack of evidence. He was accused of having helped two suspects escape after the 2004 attacks, one who is now a defendant in the trial and another who is believed to have died in Iraq as a suicide bomber. Mr. Moussaten's brother and an uncle remain on trial.
